text: Agha Syed Hamid Ali Shah Moosavi (; 1930 - 25 July 2022) was an Indian Shia Islam leader. He was the patron-in-chief of the supreme Shia ullama board and president of Tehrik-e-Nafaz-e-Fiqah-e-Jafaria () from 1982 until his death. He was born in Tharparkar, then-British India. Moosavi died on 25 July 2022, aged 92 . ==References== Category:2022 deaths Category:1940 births Category:Indian religious leaders
title: Agha Syed Hamid Ali Shah Moosavi
